name: Brick Breaker VS
description:
A 1 vs 1 local arcade game where you bounce a ball to break stuff. There are 4 different classes to choose from, and they each get different powerups during the game. Try to get a higher score than your opponent by clearing the screen first. There are quite a few levels, so play until you get bored I guess!

I think this was the first game I worked on in Unity. It was a student project for a game design course, developed as a team of 4. Overall not too bad for our first attempt, and I definitely learned a lot.
